I soak in a tepid bath with a Tablespoon on olive oil. It will hydrate your skin, and what makes it to the blood stream is actually good for you. this tx does work, but I've been bad lately and haven't done it for a while and am getting very dried out again.At least while doing this a couple times a week my skin and scalp stopped hurting itching scaling, and my hair all stayed.
